response.original_title: The Way Back: England's Evolution Under Gareth Southgate
response.overview: In 2016 England hit rock bottom following Sam Allardyce's controversial departure. Following years of tournament disappointment, the FA selected Gareth Southgate to help the rebuilding process. Follow the journey as Southgate takes the job initially as interim to eventually taking the Three Lions to their first World Cup semi-final since 1990.
response.title: The Way Back: England's Evolution Under Gareth Southgate
